donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The Project Initiation Plan would support the government and other stakeholders to come up with a five year programme under the umbrella of OP-II. The programme would aim to further enhance DRR capacities at the national and sub-national levels. The new programme would be formulated around the outcomes of SPA.3, lessons and experience of One UN JP on DRM, stocktaking of ongoing initiatives and gaps and detailed consultation with the stakeholders (government, international and national NGOs and donors, IFIs).

project_title: DRR support to Pakistan - Project Initiation Plan (PIP)
